Entry.JapaneseText: こんな、でっかい絵、 一体、誰が描いたんだろうな。
Entry.EnglishText: Just who in this world could have drawn a picture this big?

Entry.JapaneseText: 巨人でしょ？ って言うか、 古代カレギア人だネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Probably giants? That is to say, ancient Callegeans.

Entry.JapaneseText: 巨人？ 古代カレギア人？ んんー？？？
古代カレギア人は、今のボクたちよりも 大きかったんだヨ。
Entry.EnglishText: Ancient Callegeans were much bigger than we are today.

Entry.JapaneseText: 高い山もひとまたぎだったって言うから、 こんなラクガキくらい、ちょちょいのチョイだネ。
Entry.EnglishText: They say that they could cross tall mountains in a single step, so a sketch like this would've been a walk in the park.

Entry.JapaneseText: ええーッ？ 本当か？ そりゃ、知らなかった……
Entry.EnglishText: Whaaat, really? I didn't know that...

Entry.JapaneseText: ホント、ホント！ ボクって物知りでしょ？ フフフフ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, of course! Am I not knowledgeable? Hm hm hm hm!
